create(bytes32,address,address,address,a.details: Creates a new sale (called by the Loans contract)

params.pubKeyHash: The Bitcoin Public Key Hash of the Liquidator
params.secretHashA: The Secret Hash of the Borrower for the current sale number
params.secretHashB: The Secret Hash of the Lender for the current sale number
params.secretHashC: The Secret Hash of the Arbiter for the current sale number
params.secretHashD: the Secret Hash of the Liquidator

create(bytes32,address,address,address,a.return: sale The Id of the sale

hasSecrets(bytes32).details: Indicates that two of Secret A, Secret B, Secret C have been submitted

params.secret_: The secret provided by the borrower, lender, arbiter, or liquidator

params.seizableSig: The Bitcoin seizable collateral signature     *         Note: More info on the collateral swap script can be seen here: https://github.com/AtomicLoans/chainabstractionlayer-loans

accept(bytes32).notice: Accept discount buy by liquidator and disperse funds to rightful parties

provideSecret(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Provide secret to enable liquidator to claim collateral

provideSig(bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: Provide Bitcoin signatures for moving collateral to collateral swap script
